column4: can anybody tell me how i can boot the ubuntu 6.06 cd so that installation starts immediately? i have a problem using the installation from the live cd. performance is non-existant. thank you!
you cannot immedieately install from the "live cd" you need to download another cd the "alternate install" cd
thank you. i will check the ubuntu.com
yeah, you should be able to find what you need from this page: http://www.ubuntu.com/download
